verses.verse: For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> I considered <S%H5414><s%> in <S%H413><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> even to declare <S%H952><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this, <S%H2088><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> and the wise, <S%H2450><s%> and their works, <S%H5652><s%> are in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of God: <S%H430><s%> no <S%H369><s%> man <S%H120><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> either <S%H1571><s%> love <S%H160><s%> or <S%H1571><s%> hatred <S%H8135><s%> by all <S%H3605><s%> that is before <S%H6440><s%> them.

All <S%H3605><s%> things come alike <S%H834><s%> to all: <S%H3605><s%> there is one <S%H259><s%> event <S%H4745><s%> to the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> and to the wicked; <S%H7563><s%> to the good <S%H2896><s%> and to the clean, <S%H2889><s%> and to the unclean; <S%H2931><s%> to him that sacrificeth, <S%H2076><s%> and to him that sacrificeth <S%H834><s%> <S%H2076><s%> not: <S%H369><s%> as is the good, <S%H2896><s%> so is the sinner; <S%H2398><s%> and he that sweareth, <S%H7650><s%> as <S%H834><s%> he that feareth <S%H3372><s%> an oath. <S%H7621><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> is an evil <S%H7451><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> things that <S%H834><s%> are done <S%H6213><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the sun, <S%H8121><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> there is one <S%H259><s%> event <S%H4745><s%> unto all: <S%H3605><s%> yea, also <S%H1571><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of evil, <S%H7451><s%> and madness <S%H1947><s%> is in their heart <S%H3824><s%> while they live, <S%H2416><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> that they go to <S%H413><s%> the dead. <S%H4191><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> to him <S%H4310><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is joined <S%H2266><s%> to <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the living <S%H2416><s%> there is <S%H3426><s%> hope: <S%H986><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> a living <S%H2416><s%> dog <S%H3611><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> a dead <S%H4191><s%> lion. <S%H738><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the living <S%H2416><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> that they shall die: <S%H7945><s%> <S%H4191><s%> but the dead <S%H4191><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H369><s%> any thing, <S%H3972><s%> neither <S%H369><s%> have they any more <S%H5750><s%> a reward; <S%H7939><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the memory <S%H2143><s%> of them is forgotten. <S%H7911><s%>

Also <S%H1571><s%> their love, <S%H160><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> their hatred, <S%H8135><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> their envy, <S%H7068><s%> is now <S%H3528><s%> perished; <S%H6><s%> neither <S%H369><s%> have they any more <S%H5750><s%> a portion <S%H2506><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> in any <S%H3605><s%> thing that <S%H834><s%> is done <S%H6213><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the sun. <S%H8121><s%>

Go <S%H1980><s%> thy way, eat <S%H398><s%> thy bread <S%H3899><s%> with joy, <S%H8057><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> thy wine <S%H3196><s%> with a merry <S%H2896><s%> heart; <S%H3820><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> God <S%H430><s%> now <S%H3528><s%> accepteth <S%H7521><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy works. <S%H4639><s%>
Let thy garments <S%H899><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> always <S%H3605><s%> <S%H6256><s%> white; <S%H3836><s%> and let thy head <S%H7218><s%> lack <S%H2637><s%> no <S%H408><s%> ointment. <S%H8081><s%>

Live joyfully <S%H2416><s%> <S%H7200><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> thou lovest <S%H157><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of thy vanity, <S%H1892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he hath given <S%H5414><s%> thee under <S%H8478><s%> the sun, <S%H8121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy vanity: <S%H1892><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> is thy portion <S%H2506><s%> in this life, <S%H2416><s%> and in thy labor <S%H5999><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> takest <S%H6001><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the sun. <S%H8121><s%>

Whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> thy hand <S%H3027><s%> findeth <S%H4672><s%> to do, <S%H6213><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> it with thy might; <S%H3581><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> there is no <S%H369><s%> work, <S%H4639><s%> nor device, <S%H2808><s%> nor knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> nor wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> in the grave, <S%H7585><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> goest. <S%H1980><s%>

I returned, <S%H7725><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the sun, <S%H8121><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the race <S%H4793><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> to the swift, <S%H7031><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> the battle <S%H4421><s%> to the strong, <S%H1368><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> yet <S%H1571><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> to the wise, <S%H2450><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> yet <S%H1571><s%> riches <S%H6239><s%> to men of understanding, <S%H995><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> yet <S%H1571><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> to men of skill; <S%H3045><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> and chance <S%H6294><s%> happeneth <S%H7136><s%> to <S%H853><s%> them all. <S%H3605><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> man <S%H120><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> his time: <S%H6256><s%> as the fishes <S%H1709><s%> that are taken <S%H7945><s%> <S%H270><s%> in an evil <S%H7451><s%> net, <S%H4686><s%> and as the birds <S%H6833><s%> that are caught <S%H270><s%> in the snare; <S%H6341><s%> so are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> snared <S%H3369><s%> in an evil <S%H7451><s%> time, <S%H6256><s%> when it falleth <S%H7945><s%> <S%H5307><s%> suddenly <S%H6597><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them.
This <S%H2090><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> have I seen <S%H7200><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the sun, <S%H8121><s%> and it <S%H1931><s%> seemed great <S%H1419><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me:

There was a little <S%H6996><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> and few <S%H4592><s%> men <S%H376><s%> within it; and there came <S%H935><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> against <S%H413><s%> it, and besieged <S%H5437><s%> it, and built <S%H1129><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> bulwarks <S%H4685><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it:

Now there was found <S%H4672><s%> in it a poor <S%H4542><s%> wise <S%H2450><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> by his wisdom <S%H2451><s%> delivered <S%H4422><s%> <S%H853><s%> the city; <S%H5892><s%> yet no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H120><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> that same <S%H1931><s%> poor <S%H4542><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> I, <S%H589><s%> Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than strength: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1369><s%> nevertheless the poor man's <S%H4542><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is despised, <S%H959><s%> and his words <S%H1697><s%> are not <S%H369><s%> heard. <S%H8085><s%>

The words <S%H1697><s%> of wise <S%H2450><s%> men are heard <S%H8085><s%> in quiet <S%H5183><s%> more than the cry <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2201><s%> of him that ruleth <S%H4910><s%> among fools. <S%H3684><s%>

Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than weapons <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3627><s%> of war: <S%H7128><s%> but one <S%H259><s%> sinner <S%H2398><s%> destroyeth <S%H6><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> good. <S%H2896><s%>
